name: Framebreakers
description:
In the epic wake of the Napoleonic wars, textile artisans in Nottingham take up arms against the greed of factory owners.

Inflict financial damage on these wretched hosiers by smashing as many of their mechanical looms as you can before time runs out!

(If you're struggling, remember that this is a rhythm game.)

Made in (less than) a week for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 6.
